titleStmt.title: Scotch Moggy's misfortune: together with her chearful hops, that Shakum Guie will bury his wife, and then make Moggy a happy mother. To an excellent new tune. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah]. Blare, J[ohn]. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Shakum Guie has gotten a wife ..."
Date, place of publication and publishers' names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
